Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Chamberlain et al. Cell type classification and discovery across diseases, technologies and tissues reveals conserved gene signatures and enables standardized single-cell readouts. bioRxiv (2021).

@Article{,
  author = {Mathew Chamberlain and Nima Nouri and Andre Kurlovs and Richa Hanamsagar and Frank O. Nestle and Emanuele de Rinaldis and Virginia Savova},
  title = {Cell Type Classification and Discovery across Diseases, Technologies and Tissues Reveals Conserved Gene Signatures of Immune Phenotypes},
  journal = {Journal of Bioinformatics and Systems Biology},
  year = {2023},
  doi = {10.26502/jbsb.5107057},
}
